## Goal

The goal of I-ADOPT is to provide an Interoperability Framework for representing FAIR observable properties. 

## Citation of the I-ADOPT recommendations

Magagna, B., Moncoiff√©, G., Devaraju, A., Stoica, M., Schindler, S., Pamment, A., & RDA I-ADOPT WG. (2022). InteroperAble Descriptions of Observable Property Terminologies (I-ADOPT) WG Outputs and Recommendations (1.1.0). Zenodo. https://doi.org/10.15497/RDA00071


## Contribute

You can contribute to I-ADOPT by participating at our regular calls and by providing your variable description to our [github repository](https://github.com/i-adopt/variables).
